creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: constructed like an apron; larger unlined part has center embroidered section of geometics in hexagons; border of plain and embroidered strips on three sides; two corners have layered squares with embroidery inset of triangles; small lined part has embroidered hexagons in rectangles; red, black, tan, purple
title: Baby Carrier
